name: Messages in/sec
description: The PromQL query measures the summed delta between the High and Low watermark of all partitions in the given topic. It is not accurate for compacted topics that contain compacted records.
question: What is the total delta between the High and Low watermark of partitions in the given topic?

description: The PromQL query measures the summed delta between the High and Low watermark of all partitions in the given topic. It is not accurate for compacted topics that contain compacted records.
question: How can we monitor the rate of change in the High watermark of partitions in the given topic?

name: Messages in/sec
description: The PromQL query measures the summed delta between the High and Low watermark of all partitions in the given topic. It is not accurate for compacted topics that contain compacted records.
question: Which partitions in the given topic have the largest difference between High and Low watermark?

name: Cluster Version
description: This PromQL query measures the version of the cluster software running on the monitored instances.
question: What is the current version of the cluster software?
